name: A Game With A Flamethrower
description:
You where chosen to be the latest test subject for Invention Inc. new weapon The Flamethrower! Make your way across the test chambers, and face the ultimate test... (I am not going to tell your so you should play the game to the end to find out)

Controls: Mouse to Aim, WASD or Arrows to move

Thanks to QBE, pimen, XYEzawr, Stealthix And VOiD1 for some of the assets.
